name: my-custom-rules
description: Global CLI for custom ESLint rules

scripts.clean:nul: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const skip=new Set(['node_modules','.git']);const walk=dir=>{for(const ent of fs.readdirSync(dir,{withFileTypes:true})){if(ent.isDirectory()){if(skip.has(ent.name)) continue;walk(path.join(dir,ent.name));}else if(ent.isFile()&&ent.name.toLowerCase()==='nul'){fs.unlinkSync(path.join(dir,ent.name));}}};walk(process.cwd());"
